response:
"in deutschland schützen wir sorgfältig unsere persönlichen daten. lasst uns die privatsphäre online genauso ernst nehmen wie offline. sei bewusst, was du teilst! #datenschutz"

translation: "in germany, we carefully protect our personal data. let's take online privacy just as seriously as offline privacy. be mindful of what you share! #dataprivacy"
